text: Firefly is a U.S. National Security Agency public-key key exchange protocol, used in EKMS, the STU-III secure telephone, and several other U.S. cryptographic systems. ==References== * * Communications Security Custodian Guide, USAREUR Pamphlet 380-40 * TACLANE-Micro Inline Network Encryptor Interface & Operator’s Guide Category:Cryptographic protocols
title: Firefly (key exchange protocol)
